headline: How AI Fueled Black Friday Shopping This Year
summary: U.S. e-commerce sales on the unofficial shopping holiday hit a record this year, with online spending hitting $10.8 billion, up 10.2% from 2023, according to Adobe Analytics.

raw.headline: How AI Fueled Black Friday Shopping This Year
raw.summary: U.S. e-commerce sales on the unofficial shopping holiday hit a record this year, with online spending hitting $10.8 billion, up 10.2% from 2023, according to Adobe Analytics.

headline: Winners and losers of Black Friday 2024
summary: With deals all spread out and e-commerce surging even on Thanksgiving Day, the red-letter event seems to be losing its punch.

raw.headline: Winners and losers of Black Friday 2024
raw.summary: With deals all spread out and e-commerce surging even on Thanksgiving Day, the red-letter event seems to be losing its punch.

headline: Black Friday data shows US shoppers spent $10.8 billion online
summary: U.S. shoppers used their mobile phones, laptops, desktops and other devices to make roughly $10.8 billion in purchases online on Black Friday, an updated tally from Adobe Analytics showed. Black Friday, the day after the U.S. Thanksgiving holiday, marks the official start of the holiday shopping season for retailers and competition has intensified to win every penny-pinched shopper seeking discounts. Increased online shopping potentially favors e-commerce giants such as Amazon.com and Walmart.

headline: The Whiz Kid Who Made Billions for Yale Is Rethinking His China Strategy
summary: Lei Zhang helped university endowments and foundations make big returns in his native country, then the U.S. soured on China.

raw.headline: The Whiz Kid Who Made Billions for Yale Is Rethinking His China Strategy

headline: Black Friday Online Sales Are on Track for Record
summary: Adobe expects that by the end of the day, consumers will spend between $10.7 billion and $11 billion, which would be an e-commerce record sales figure.  “Adobe is reaffirming its forecast that a new e-commerce record will be set on Black Friday and surge past the $10 billion mark,” said Vivek Pandya, lead analyst at Adobe Digital Insights.  The strongest shopping hours were between 10 a.m. and 2 p.m., but activity should ramp up again this evening, Adobe said.
